text_content: The Beaver can be found around the Beaver House structure in the Forest. There are always 3 beavers per Beaver House.
Beaver Houses are made from Piles of Sticks. If you break a naturally generated one you have a chance to find a Water Lily which can be used to breed the Beavers.
The Beaver will pick a nearby Pile of Sticks as its home position and will stay in a 16 block radius around the block.
If you bring the Beaver 26 blocks from its home position it will forget that position and wander randomly until it finds a new pile of sticks.
If the Beaver gets near a Log it can strip it. When this happens it will drop bark and has a chance to drop sawdust.
